Find My Phone Settings
How It Works Back Next Got It Skip
Can\'t find your phone? Not a problem! Just clap your hands and your phone will immediately respond! Select a sound that the phone will play and its volume You can set phone reaction to claps, voice, or both With these options enabled, the phone will vibrate and blink with a flashlight
Language Activate Deactivate
